It is a very iffy yes from me. I love the game and it is awesome. However the lack of a decent matchmaking system, constant cheaters/hackers, toxic team mates, smurfs, and people throwing makes it a difficult one to recommend. My advice is to try your best to play with friends. The more randoms you have the more likely your experience is going to be bad.
There is a reason this game stayed relevant for 20 years
